planes.title: Welcome!
planes.text:
You have found my online portfolio.
 I am a student and developer from Germany. Currently,
I am studying computer science at the University 
of Applied Sciences in Offenburg while working as a 
full stack web-developer.

This website serves as a interactive resume
and a place for me to experiment with 3D-animations. 

Feel free to take a look around!

footer.text: Interested in working together? Let's talk!
